commands./start:
Hello, i'm bot
Available help commands:
?bitcoin, ?ethereum, ?ripple
?dice
?newyear, ?summer
?random
?where, ?location
?chat_id
?unix_time
commands.?dice: /dice N-edged M times - bot throws N-edged dice M times
commands.?where: /where - bot gives location with coordinates (?locations - shows locations list)
commands.?location: /location <latitude> <longitude> - shows place with these coordinates on map
